issue.title: can't spawn a model with the same name as a previously-deleted one

content.raw: This was in version 1.3, using the ROS service to spawn the model, and the gazebo gui to delete it. Since the server reports no errors, I wouldn't be surprised if it was just a problem with the gui client.
content.html: This was in version 1.3, using the ROS service to spawn the model, and the gazebo gui to delete it. Since the server reports no errors, I wouldn't be surprised if it was just a problem with the gui client.
